bio: I specialize in both frontend and backend development for intricate and scalable web applications. My expertise lies in software engineering, and I share insights on software development through my blog. Curious about how I can contribute to your project? Feel free to explore my project portfolio and online resume for more details.
services_headline: With over three years of experience, I have actively contributed to software development projects on a B2B contract basis for numerous companies globally. Here's a brief glimpse of my primary technical skills and the technologies I've employed in my work.
